## PopulatableEthersLiquity.redeemSTAR() method

Redeem STAR to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
redeemSTAR(amount: any, maxRedemptionRate: any, overrides: any): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | any | Amount of STAR to be redeemed. |
|  maxRedemptionRate | any | Maximum acceptable [redemption rate](./lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md)<!-- -->. |
|  overrides | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

If `maxRedemptionRate` is omitted, the current redemption rate (based on `amount`<!-- -->) plus 0.1% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
